text: Helga Weisz (born 1961 in Villach) is an Austrian climate scientist. She is a researcher at Potsdam Institute for Climate Impact Research. She is editor–in- chief of the journal GAIA. She graduated from University of Vienna, and from Humboldt University Berlin. She was visiting scholar, at University of Queensland.
